speaker: Customer
text: You have reached the voicemail of John Smith. I'm unable to take your call right now.

speaker: Agent
text: Hello John, this is Lisa from Debt Solutions. I'm calling regarding your outstanding balance.

speaker: Customer
text: Please leave your name and number after the beep.

speaker: Agent
text: You can reach me at one eight hundred two three four five six seven. It's important we discuss this matter soon.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you for calling. Your call is important to me.
